Script for Narrator

Global script GlobalScript

[NARR1] Narrator: Scanning...
Samantha: The engines have been powered down, otherwise everything looks optimal.

[NARR1] Narrator: Scanning...
Samantha: Very strange.
Samantha: All persons aboard are unconscious?
Samantha: All but one.
Samantha: Let me see if I can scan for the one conscious lifeform...
[NARR2] Narrator: Lifeform Scan...
[NARR3] Narrator: ** Lifeform Found **
Samantha: Found them!
Samantha: A cat?! Belonging to a space walker.
Samantha: The scan says he's in the Airlock corridor.
Samantha: This situation is sub par.
Samantha: I can't instruct a cat on how to fly a ship.
Samantha: And no one is awake to turn on my override controls. For want of a button push, the spaceship was lost.
Samantha: Well, wait. A cat has paws? And mass? Couldn't it push the button?

Samantha: This laser acts as a short range medical scan. It's more useful in medical bays.
[NARR4] Narrator: Right-click to cancel laser mode
Samantha: The kitty is watching the laser carefully.
